p: To carry out the anti-inflammatory assay, 20, 40, 60 and 80 mg/mL of the Chasmanthera dependens and Chenopodium ambrosioides extracts were prepared using absolute methanol as the solvent. The positive control solution was prepared by dissolving 50 mg of diclofenac in 10 mL, methanol. The in-vitro anti-inflammatory activities of the extracts and diclofenac were assayed by measuring its inhibition of the enzyme-substrate reactions involving the chemokines; TNF-Î±, Cox-2, IL-10 and PGE-2.
